text.div:
observationSubjectSearchParameter

Parameter subject:reference

Searches for observations by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

ResourceObservation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesObservation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: observationSubjectSearchParameter
description: Searches for observations by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient={patientUuid}
